channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-14958] CLONE - Fix source-level compatibility after HADOOP-11252
item.description:
Reported by chiwanpark

Since 2.7.3 release, Client.get/setPingInterval is changed from public to package-private.

Giraph is one of broken examples for this changes. (https://github.com/apache/giraph/blob/release-1.0/giraph-core/src/main/java/org/apache/giraph/job/GiraphJob.java#L202)
item.summary: CLONE - Fix source-level compatibility after HADOOP-11252

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I think we should fix this issue in 2.8 and 2.9, and may be in 3.x as well. CC subru, andrew.wang and wangda.

-1 overall

This message was automatically generated.

Thanks jianhe for review! The mvn site error is not related, but related to yetus - indicated by following messages:

ERROR: yetus-dl: unable to download https://archive.apache.org/dist/yetus/0.4.0//yetus-0.4.0-bin.tar.gz

mvn site build locally get passed w/o this patch. UT failed is also not related.

I will commit it shortly if no further comments.
I have commit the patch for trunk, branch-3.0, branch-2, branch-2.8 and branch-2.8.2. Thanks jianhe for review!
